entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C

Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: W 20 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
